ticket.title: Allow use of :path_prefix and :name_prefix outside of namespaced routes
ticket.original-body:
The `:path_prefix` and `:name_prefix` options are supported almost correctly on all routes, but they are only removed from the options hash in `divide_route_options` if the `:namespace` option is set, which interferes with route generation (i.e. the `:path_prefix` must be supplied in order for the route to match).
This is a shame since it would be convenient to use `with_options` to supply a common `:path_prefix` to a bunch of routes.
Attached is a tiny patch to always discard the `:path_prefix` and `:name_prefix` options, not just when a `namespace` is in effect.
